TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageFault extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 错误在内存中的表示形式，该错误可以传递到 以创建包含错误的消息。

span.span: Represents an in-memory representation of a SOAP fault that can be passed to to create a message that contains a fault.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当您需要一个内存中的 SOAP 错误，并且该错误可修改并用于创建包含错误信息的 SOAP 消息时，请使用 类。Use the class any time you need an in-memory SOAP fault that can be modified and used to create a SOAP message that contains the fault information. 通常，在实现 接口时使用 类。Typically, the class is used when implementing the interface. 在这种情况下，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 传递对象，并将其用于你的特定需求 (例如，您可以自定义或记录错误信息)。In this case, Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) passes the object and you use it for your specific needs (for example, you can customize the or to log fault information). 但是， 可在需要处理自定义 SOAP 错误消息的任何地方使用。However, can be used anywhere custom SOAP fault message handling is required. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 最常见的用法。The following code example shows the most common use of . 和 都传入一个 对象，可修改该对象并将其返回给系统（对于 的情况），或者可使用该对象执行某些自定义的错误相关行为（对于 的情况）。Both the and pass in a object that can be modified and returned to the system (in the case of ) or used to perform some custom fault-related behavior (in the case of ). 在此示例中，方法将所有转换将对象插入对象，其中包含类型的对象`GreetingFault`并返回该自定义到 WCF。In this example, the method converts all objects into a object that contains a object of type `GreetingFault` and returns that customized to WCF. [!code-csharp[IErrorHandler#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/ierrorhandler.cs#6)] [!code-vb[IErrorHandler#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/vb/ierrorhandler.vb#6)]
